comments.body:
@iravid thanks! I wouldn't mind having `@Contended` here, but we have what we have. 

Though looks like, I forgot there should be 1 between 0 and 2 ðŸ˜„, so padding wasn't 100% correct. Last commit fixes this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@ * super-class go before fields of a sub-class in the object's
 * layout. So, a properly crafted inheritance chain can guarantee
 * spacing for the hot fields.
 *
 * To illustrate the effect of such padding, here's an output by JOL
